# Necrosuit
## Overview
**Type**: Magic Item
#Special-Item-Type/Magic-Item

**Group**: Wondrous Items
#Special-Item-Group/Wondrous-Items

**Rarity**: Legendary
#Special-Item-Rarity/Legendary

**Attunement**: *(requires attunement)*

## Description
The wearer of this *[[Mycelosuits|mycelosuit]]* is immune to necrotic damage, but also gains vulnerability to radiant damage while this suit is activated. These suits are made from [[Mortem Diasporus|necroshroom]] (mortem diasporous).
